channel.name: Excel Adapter
channel.description:
This web service channel shows how Iguana can be used to populate a live feed to an excel spreadsheet.
See: http://help.interfaceware.com/forums/topic/serving-live-data-into-excel
Enter your Iguana username and password to access this channel.
It actually serves up the excel spreadsheet to the user.
Once the spreadsheet is obtained it maintains a live link to Iguana.
It works with Excel 2011 on Mac and the Excel 2016 on Mac and on Windows. It may work with earlier windows releases of Excel also.

from_http.commit_comment: Changed the loading mode to binary.
